name: Saichandram Sadhu
title: Cybersecurity Analyst • VAPT • IDS • Malware Forensics
about: Cybersecurity professional specializing in penetration testing, malware forensics, and intrusion detection. Skilled in vulnerability assessment, network defense, and digital forensics with hands-on experience in threat analysis and incident monitoring. Currently pursuing M.Sc. in IT (Cyber Security) at Gujarat University.
